professional_highlights: Architected and implemented multi-tenant SSO with PKCE and dynamic registration compliant with the MCP specification.
Built the Agentic Framework UI with WebSocket-based chat and Redis-backed persistence for user-created AI agents.
Led framework migrations from Angular 16 to 19. Created Schematics for convenient downstream adoption of updates
Enhanced accessibility and performance using NVDA testing, lazy loading, and Service Worker–based offline caching.
Experience with backend technologies such as NestJS and Springboot, primarily for aggregation of down stream services or as BFF layers.
Integrated observability with Datadog, LogRocket, and ELK, exposing latency, token use, and session health.

highlights: Implemented multi-tenant SSO with dynamic client registration, auth-server discovery via PRM, and full PKCE/token lifecycle management per MCP.
Built the Agentic Framework UI enabling users to create and chat with custom agents via a WebSocket interface; channels maintained using Redis pub/sub with asynchronous backups.
Developed Angular modules for agent creation, configuration, and live conversation management.
Created Kibana dashboards for custom metrics: tokens consumed, average time per turn, and agent response latency.
Led migration from Angular 16 -> 19 across shared libraries and app modules.
Developed reusable Angular Schematics to automate migration for internal teams using our libraries.
Updated components and theming to comply with brand/styling evolution updates.
Delivered accessibility enhancements and verified with the NVDA screen reader.
Set up Cypress E2E testing wired into Jenkins pipelines for automated regression.
Migrated a production React app from JSX to TSX in stages using tsc and nodets without breaking compilation.
Reduced bundle size by offloading heavy third-party plugins to Service Workers; implemented offline-first caching.
Instrumented and automated Redux state synchronization with AWS ElastiCache for continuous backup and fast recovery.
Stored user preferences and layouts in DynamoDB for persistent personalization.
Owned the BFF layer: a GraphQL backend in NestJS aggregating and shaping data for React clients; added domain APIs for claims and live updates.
Integrated telemetry with Datadog to monitor latency and session health.
Built Angular dashboards for policyholders with reusable components and shared services.
Implemented Reactive Forms, custom directives, and RxJS observables for interactive data handling.
Developed Spring Boot APIs for policy and authentication workflows; deployed via Docker on AWS EKS.

skills.items:
• JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, HTML, CSS
  • Redux, NgRx, RxJS
  • Bootstrap, Angular Material, Material UI

• Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Java EE
  • Node.js, NestJS, Express.js
  • GraphQL
  • PostgreSQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, Redis

• AWS (EKS, SQS, SNS, S3, CloudWatch, CloudFormation)
  • Docker, Kubernetes
  • Git, Jenkins, Bamboo

• Apache Kafka, WebSockets
  • Datadog, LogRocket, Splunk, Quantum Metric, ELK, Kibana
